description:
After getting their first paychecks, the four heroines wish to pay Kikuru back for all his help. It`s a nice sentiment, but things obviously don`t go as planned...
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Heute will ich nicht zurück / Des Rätsels Lösung in klein
I Don`t Want to Go Home Today / The Little Mystery Solver
Je ne veux pas rentrer / Little le détective
Я не хочу идти домой сейчас / Решение загадки
今日は帰りたくない / 謎解きリトル
